plot: Two comic performers return to the village where one resided years earlier. They get material for a new routine and also point out a problem to the villagers.
title: Xiao po qing wang
plot_es: Two comic performers return to the village where one resided years earlier. They get material for a new routine and also point out a problem to the villagers.
plot_en: Two comic performers return to the village where one resided years earlier. They get material for a new routine and also point out a problem to the villagers.
